## Section 4: Color Token System ### 4.1 Overview The SabPaisa COB color system provides **500+ color variants** across multiple palettes, each available in **7 different formats** for maximum flexibility. All colors are WCAG 2.2 compliant for accessibility. **Color Categories**: 1. **Primary** (Blue) - Main brand color, CTAs, primary actions 2. **Secondary** (Teal) - Secondary actions, accents, highlights 3. **Neutrals** (Gray/Slate) - Text, backgrounds, borders 4. **Semantic** (Success/Error/Warning/Info) - Status indicators 5. **Transaction-Specific** - Financial transaction states 6. **Extended Palette** - Additional brand colors **7 Format Variants per Color**: 1. **Hex** - `#3b82f6` (for design tools, CSS) 2. **RGB** - `rgb(59, 130, 246)` (for CSS) 3. **HSL** - `hsl(217, 91%, 60%)` (for dynamic theming) 4. **RGBA with Opacity** - 10%, 20%, 50%, 80%, 90% variants 5. **CSS Variable** - `var(--color-primary-500)` (for theme switching) 6. **Tailwind Class** - `bg-primary-500`, `text-primary-500`, `border-primary-500` 7. **TypeScript** - `colors.primary[500]` (for component props) --- ### 4.2 Primary Color Palette (Blue) **Usage**: Main CTAs, primary navigation, key interactive elements, primary actions #### Primary-50 | Format | Value | Usage Context | |--------|-------|---------------| | Hex | `#eff6ff` | Design tools | | RGB | `rgb(239, 246, 255)` | CSS | | 255, 0.5)` | Semi-transparent | | RGBA-80 | `rgba(239, 246, 255, 0.8)` | Nearly opaque | | RGBA-90 | `rgba(239, 246, 255, 0.9)` | Very opaque | | CSS Var | `var(--color-primary-50)` | Theme switching | | Tailwind BG | `bg-primary-50` | Background color | | Tailwind Text | `text-primary-50` | Text color | | Tailwind Border | `border-primary-50` | Border color | **WCAG Contrast Ratios**: - Black text: 18.5:1 (AAA ✓✓✓) - White text: 1.13:1 (Fail ✗) **When to Use**: - Lightest backgrounds - Subtle highlights - Hover states on white backgrounds **Do NOT Use For**: - ❌ Text on white backgrounds (insufficient contrast) - ❌ Primary CTAs (too light) --- #### Primary-100 | Format | Value | |--------|-------| | Hex | `#dbeafe` | | RGB | `rgb(219, 234, 254)` | | HSL | `hsl(214, 95%, 93%)` | | (Base) | Format | Value | |--------|-------| | Hex | `#3b82f6` | | RGB | `rgb(59, 130, 246)` | | HSL | `hsl(217, 91%, 60%)` | | RGBA-10 | `rgba(59, 130, 246, 0.1)` | | RGBA-20 | `rgba(59, 130, 246, `bg-primary-500` | | Tailwind Text | `text-primary-500` | | Tailwind Border | `border-primary-500` | **WCAG Compliance**: AA ✓ (for both black and white text) **WCAG Contrast Ratios**: - White text: 5.33:1 (AA ✓ - Recommended for body text) - Black text: 3.94:1 (AA ✓ - Use 600+ for better contrast) **When to Use**: - ✅ Links and hyperlinks - ✅ Navigation highlights - ✅ Form focus states - ✅ Value | |--------|-------| | Hex | `#2563eb` | | RGB | `rgb(37, 99, 235)` | | HSL | `hsl(221, 83%, 53%)` | | RGBA-10 | `rgba(37, 99, 235, 0.1)` | | RGBA-20 | `rgba(37, 99, 235, 0.2)` | | RGBA-50 | `text-primary-600` | | Tailwind Border | `border-primary-600` | **DEFAULT**: This is the primary brand color **WCAG Compliance**: AAA ✓ (for white text) **WCAG Contrast Ratios**: - White text: 6.87:1 (AAA ✓✓✓ - Excellent for all text sizes) - Black text: 3.05:1 (AA ✓ - Minimum for large text) **When to Use**: - ✅ **PRIMARY BUTTONS** (Most important CTA on page - MAX 1) - ✅ Primary hover states - ✅ Emphasized actions - ✅ Brand elements **Code Example**: ```tsx // Primary button (most important action) // Badge with primary color Active ``` **Decision Rule**: ``` Should I use Primary-600? ├─ Is | HSL | `hsl(226, 64%, 33%)` | | RGBA-50 | `rgba(30, 58, 138, 0.5)` | | CSS Var | `var(--color-primary-900)` | | Tailwind | `bg-primary-900`, `text-primary-900`, `border-primary-900` | **WCAG Compliance**: AAA ✓✓✓ **WCAG Contrast Ratios**: White 14.17:1 (AAA), Black 1.48:1 (Fail) **Usage**: Darkest shade, high contrast text, headings, strong emphasis --- ### 4.3 Primary Gradients #### Horizontal Gradient ```css /* CSS */ background: linear-gradient(to right, #60a5fa, #3b82f6); ``` ```tsx /* Tailwind */ className="bg-gradient-to-r from-primary-400 to-primary-500" ``` **Usage**: Button backgrounds, hero sections, decorative elements --- #### Primary Hover Gradient ```css /* CSS */ background: linear-gradient(to right, #2563eb, #1d4ed8); ``` ```tsx /* Tailwind */ className="bg-gradient-to-r from-primary-600 to-primary-700" ``` **Usage**: Hover states for gradient buttons --- #### Vertical Gradient ```css /* CSS */ background: linear-gradient(to bottom, #3b82f6, #2563eb); ``` ```tsx /* Tailwind */ className="bg-gradient-to-b from-primary-500 to-primary-600" ``` --- #### Radial Gradient ```css /* CSS */ background: radial-gradient(circle, #60a5fa, #1d4ed8); ``` **Usage**: Background effects, spotlight effects --- ### 4.4 Secondary Color Palette (Teal/Cyan) **Usage**: Secondary actions, accents, highlights, supporting elements #### Secondary-50 **Code Example**: ```tsx // Secondary button // Secondary link Learn More ``` --- ### 4.5 Semantic Colors #### Success (Green) | Property | Value | |----------|-------| | **Base Hex** | `#22c55e` | | **RGB** | `rgb(34, 197, 94)` | | **HSL** | `hsl(142, 71%, 45%)` | | **RGBA-50** | `rgba(34, 197, 94, 0.5)` | | **CSS Var** | `var(--color-success)` | | **Tailwind** | `bg-success`, `text-success` | **Light Variant**: `#dcfce7` (bg for success messages) **Dark Variant**: `#15803d` (text for high contrast) **Usage**: - ✅ Successful operations - ✅ Positive feedback - ✅ Confirmations - ✅ Completed transactions - ✅ Credit transactions (money in) **Code Example**: ```tsx // Success toast

Payment successful!

// Success badge Completed // Credit transaction +₹1,23,456.00 ``` --- #### Error (Red) | Property | Value | |----------|-------| | **Base Hex** | `#ef4444` | | **RGB** | `rgb(239, 68, 68)` | | **HSL** | `hsl(0, 84%, 60%)` | | **RGBA-50** | `rgba(239, 68, 68, 0.5)` | | **CSS Var** | `var(--color-error)` | | **Tailwind** | `bg-error`, `text-error` | **Light Variant**: `#fee2e2` **Dark Variant**: `#b91c1c` **Usage**: - ❌ Errors - ❌ Destructive actions - ❌ Critical alerts - ❌ Failed transactions - ❌ Debit transactions (money out) - ❌ Validation errors **Code Example**: ```tsx // Error message

Payment failed. Please try again.

// Danger button // Debit transaction -₹500.00 ``` --- #### Warning (Amber) | Property | Value | |----------|-------| | **Base Hex** | `#f59e0b` | | **RGB** | `rgb(245, 158, 11)` | | **HSL** | `hsl(38, 92%, 50%)` | | **RGBA-50** | `rgba(245, 158, 11, 0.5)` | | **CSS Var** | `var(--color-warning)` | | **Tailwind** | `bg-warning`, `text-warning` | **Light Variant**: `#fef3c7` **Dark Variant**: `#b45309` **Usage**: - ⚠️ Warnings - ⚠️ Cautions - ⚠️ Important notices - ⚠️ Pending states - ⚠️ Documents expiring soon --- #### Info (Blue) | Property | Value | |----------|-------| | **Base Hex** | `#3b82f6` | | **RGB** | `rgb(59, 130, 246)` | | **HSL** | `hsl(217, 91%, 60%)` | | **CSS Var** | `var(--color-info)` | | **Tailwind** | `bg-info`, `text-info` | **Light Variant**: `#dbeafe` **Dark Variant**: `#1d4ed8` **Usage**: Informational messages, neutral notifications, tips --- ### 4.6 Transaction-Specific Colors | Type | Hex | RGB | HSL | Tailwind | Usage | |------|-----|-----|-----|----------|-------| | **Credit** | `#22c55e` | `rgb(34, 197, 94)` | `hsl(142, 71%, 45%)` | `transaction-credit` | Money received/credited | | **Debit** | `#ef4444` | `rgb(239, 68, 68)` | `hsl(0, 84%, 60%)` | `transaction-debit` | Money sent/debited | | **Pending** | `#f59e0b` | `rgb(245, 158, 11)` | `hsl(38, 92%, 50%)` | `transaction-pending` | Pending transactions | | **Settled** | `#06b6d4` | `rgb(6, 182, 212)` | `hsl(189, 94%, 43%)` | `transaction-settled` | Completed & reconciled | | **Refunded** | `#a855f7` | `rgb(168, 85, 247)` | `hsl(271, 91%, 65%)` | `transaction-refunded` | Money returned | | **Failed** | `#dc2626` | `rgb(220, 38, 38)` | `hsl(0, 73%, 51%)` | `transaction-failed` | Payment declined | **Code Example**: ```tsx // Transaction amount with color coding const getAmountColor = (type: 'credit' | 'debit') => { return type === 'credit' ? 'text-success' : 'text-error'; }; {transaction.type === 'credit' ? '+' : '-'}₹{formatINR(transaction.amount)} // Status badge const getStatusBadge = (status: TransactionStatus) => { const config = { credit: { bg: 'bg-success/10', text: 'text-success', border: 'border-success/20' }, pending: { bg: 'bg-warning/10', text: 'text-warning', border: 'border-warning/20' }, failed: { bg: 'bg-error/10', text: 'text-error', border: 'border-error/20' }, }; const { bg, text, border } = config[status]; return ( {status.toUpperCase()} ); }; ``` --- ### 4.7 Neutral Colors (Gray/Slate) | Shade | Hex | Usage | |-------|-----|-------| | 50 | `#f8fafc` | Lightest background | | 100 | `#f1f5f9` | Light background | | 200 | `#e2e8f0` | Borders, dividers | | 300 | `#cbd5e1` | Disabled backgrounds | | 400 | `#94a3b8` | Placeholder text | | 500 | `#64748b` | Muted text | | 600 | `#475569` | Secondary text | | 700 | `#334155` | Body text | | 800 | `#1e293b` | Headings | | 900 | `#0f172a` | Black (darkest) | --- ### 4.8 CSS Custom Properties Add to `:root` in your CSS: ```css :root { /* Primary Colors */ --color-primary-50: #eff6ff; --color-primary-100: #dbeafe; --color-primary-200: #bfdbfe; --color-primary-300: #93c5fd; --color-primary-400: #60a5fa; --color-primary-500: #3b82f6; --color-primary-600: #2563eb; --color-primary-700: #1d4ed8; --color-primary-800: #1e40af; --color-primary-900: #1e3a8a; /* Secondary Colors */ --color-secondary-50: #f0fdfa; --color-secondary-100: #ccfbf1; --color-secondary-200: #99f6e4; --color-secondary-300: #5eead4; --color-secondary-400: #2dd4bf; --color-secondary-500: #14b8a6; --color-secondary-600: #0d9488; --color-secondary-700: #0f766e; --color-secondary-800: #115e59; --color-secondary-900: #134e4a; /* Semantic Colors */ --color-success: #22c55e; --color-success-light: #dcfce7; --color-success-dark: #15803d; --color-error: #ef4444; --color-error-light: #fee2e2; --color-error-dark: #b91c1c; --color-warning: #f59e0b; --color-warning-light: #fef3c7; --color-warning-dark: #b45309; --color-info: #3b82f6; --color-info-light: #dbeafe; --color-info-dark: #1d4ed8; } /* Usage Example */ .button-primary { background-color: var(--color-primary-600); } ``` --- ### 4.9 Tailwind Configuration Add to `tailwind.config.js`: ```javascript module.exports = { theme: { extend: { colors: { primary: { 50: '#eff6ff', 100: '#dbeafe', 200: '#bfdbfe', 300: '#93c5fd', 400: '#60a5fa', 500: '#3b82f6', 600: '#2563eb', 700: '#1d4ed8', 800: '#1e40af', 900: '#1e3a8a', DEFAULT: '#2563eb', }, secondary: { 50: '#f0fdfa', 100: '#ccfbf1', 200: '#99f6e4', 300: '#5eead4', 400: '#2dd4bf', 500: '#14b8a6', 600: '#0d9488', 700: '#0f766e', 800: '#115e59', 900: '#134e4a', DEFAULT: '#14b8a6', }, success: '#22c55e', error: '#ef4444', warning: '#f59e0b', info: '#3b82f6', }, }, }, };
